1.competency_description: Understands why their work has been prioritized and how that plays into the team strategy and vision
Launches well defined and well scoped projects with some support
Implements best practices around measurement, experimentation, coordination, documentation with support
Builds positive relationships with immediate team
Requires support to manage through difficult interactions and relationships
Successfully manages small meetings with crossfunctional (design, eng, etc.) stakeholders
Consistently documents well defined areas, decisions, and plans in a way that is accurate and easy to consume
Team looks to them as the owner of their features
Thoughtfully opinionated and able to influence direction and execution with support
Releases stable features/products that drive tangible business value measured via clearly articulated metrics.
Makes meaningful and useful (informative, de-risking, etc.) progress against long-term initiatives.

2.competency_description: With some support, able to build a clear and well articulated roadmap for their area that describes a planned set of work and the rationale that went into prioritization and selection.
Seamlessly executes across most feature and product development work with crossfunctional counterparts with no support
Understands and consistently implements data-driven decision making best practices (dashboarding, opportunity sizing, impact analysis, etc.)
Builds positive relationships with immediate team and crosstrack peers
Able to manage through small conflict and contentious team topics within their domain
Able to successfully represent their domain (vision, goals, roadmap, narratives) to Track and B&T leadership.
Leads meetings with large groups of crossfunctional stakeholders to successful outcomes.
Leads a team of engineers and crossfunctional counterparts through alignment and execution
Broadly perceived as the subject matter expert for their product - the what, why, and how.
Releases great iterative product experiences that have meaningful and measurable impact to track KPIs or makes meaningful progress against a long-term initiative.
Collaborates with manager to set and define goals for area.
Serves as the coordinator and playmaker for the team enabling the highest and best possible output from the team through well crafted routines
Increases capacity of broader organization through interviewing or initiatives
Explains more complex topics with ease and structure. Requires support for framing and communicating contentious or ambiguous areas.

3.competency_description: Independently compiles a roadmap for their area with clear articulation of near-term tactics and goals as well as long-term opportunities informed by track and B&T goals.
Owns areas of the B&T OpEd as they relate to their products.
Successfully executes on product development work with crossfunctional counterparts. .
Able to break down large, complex initiatives into smaller pieces for successful execution. May require support for broad cross-organizational coordination and alignment
Consistently implements all best practices - measurement, experimentation, user research, etc.
Moves team with urgency and independently sets good goals
Builds positive relationships with immediate team, crosstrack peers, and B&T stakeholders
Successfully and independently navigates contention within the team and across disciplines to keep team morale high
Represents Carvana culture day-to-day and through challenges within the team
Increases capacity of broader organization through interviewing or initiatives (such as RPM mentorship, onboarding, etc.)
Owner of communication for their product area across the B&T. Facilitates shared awareness of product priorities and approach across all interested parties.
Able to articulately speak to complex topics with large audiences.
Requires minimal support for framing and communicating contentious or ambiguous areas.
Leads one or many engineering teams and relevant crossfunctional counterparts through alignment and execution.
Perceived as a domain expert for not only the product experience but the space more broadly (i.e. including relevant operational workflows, track or B&T related metrics) within the B&T.
Successfully influences team and crossfunctional leads towards optimal execution path on both tactical and strategic decisions.
Ships iterative and net new product experiences that have significant impact to the B&Ts metrics or makes meaningful progress against complex long-term initiatives.

4.competency_description: Independently compiles a roadmap for their area with clear articulation of near-term tactics and goals as well as long-term opportunities informed by track, B&T and cluster strategy.
Owns areas of the B&T OpEd as they relate to their products and contributor to other portions that affect Track and B&T strategy more broadly.
Successfully executes on all features while coordinating with crossfunctional counterparts and across teams.
Breaks down large initiatives into tractable pieces and able to identify and execute on net new areas of investment.
Consistently implements all best practices - measurement, experimentation, user research, etc.
Moves team with urgency and independently sets good goals
In addition to leading their own team through planned projects, also able to successfully execute on high-priority, impromptu projects relevant to their area
Builds positive relationships with immediate team, crosstrack peers, and B&T stakeholders
Successfully and independently navigates contention within the team, across disciplines, and across teams to keep team morale high
Represents Carvana culture day-to-day and through challenges within the team
Increases capacity of broader organization through interviewing or initiatives (such as RPM mentorship, onboarding, etc.)
Owner of communication for their product area across the B&T. Facilitates shared awareness of product priorities and approach across the company.
Leads difficult conversations and able to articulately speak to complex topics with large audiences.
Successfully frames complex and ambiguous areas and decisions accurately and convincingly to all stakeholders with limited support.
Leads one or many engineering teams and relevant crossfunctional counterparts through alignment and execution.
Perceived as a domain expert for not only the product experience but the space more broadly (i.e. including relevant operational workflows, track or B&T related metrics) within the B&T.
Influences immediate team and related crosstrack teams to drive toward optimal execution path and on long-term strategy.
Consistently releases great, differentiated product experiences that have significant impact to the B&T or makes significant progress against complex long-term initiatives.

5.competency_description: Able to document a clear vision and strategy that serves as a short- and long-term framework for supporting tracks.
Contributes to significant pieces of the OpEd and likely owns certain deliverables.
Drives complex, multi-B&T projects that require coordination across multiple teams
Ensures strong execution across the track reflecting all best practices
Coordinates goal setting and alignment across tracks and with B&T stakeholders
In addition to leading their own team through planned projects, also able to successfully execute on high-priority, impromptu projects relevant to their area
Contributes to staffing and structure decisions for the track
Builds and develops a positive culture across the track
Acts as heat sink for difficult conversations, escalations, and open issues within their B&T and across their supported tracks.
Role model for ottheir PMs on how to live the Carvana values
Increases capacity of the broader organization through interviewing, mentorship, and contributing to ottheir discipline-level programs (RPM program, PM onboarding, CoE)
Owner of communication for their tracks across the B&T. Facilitates shared awareness of product priorities and approach across the company.
Leads difficult conversations and able to articulately speak to complex topics with large audiences.
Independently able to structure complex, broad problem spaces - tactcal and strategic - to drive decision making and alignment across senior stakeholders.
May lead a team of PMs - providing them with support and guidance while always representing Carvana leadership values. Fully accountable for the success and failure of the track.
Actively recruits APM / PM / Sr PM talent into the organization in addition to growing from within.
The single point of contact for their area as it relates to product, but also fully capable of speaking to the broader strategy and approach of the B&T as it relates to their area.
Able to align and influence B&T leadership and track PMs around optimal short- and long-term paths.
Delivers significant metric impact or progress against a long-term initiative that is critical to the success of the B&T.
Impacts B&T strategy and critical contributor to overall track output.

6.competency_description: Defines and communicates near-term frameworks and long-term strategy that provides direction to B&T product and crossfunctional areas.
Co-owner of the B&T OpEd alongside Captain and other stakeholders.
Responsible for coordinated execution across multiple tracks
Drives intra-B&T initiatives and/or high-impact initiatives across multiple teams building alignment amongst senior leaders across the company
Reactively optimizes teams execution through evaluation of routines.
Coordinates and owns staffing and structure decisions for responsible areas
Develops strong relationships across disciplines and senior stakeholders
Heat sink for challenging topics, contention, and escalations as they arise across the B&T
Defines, embodies, and carries the Carvana culture for their area. Identifies and addresses culture and morale issues across the team.
Increases capacity of the broader organization through interviewing, mentorship, and contributing to ottheir discipline-level programs (RPM program, PM onboarding, CoE)
Able to drive strategic communication for the B&T to all parties, including the executive team.
Rosetta stone for the B&T - facilitating strong levels of communication and shared awareness within the B&T.
Frequently assists in helping structure complex areas and discussions.
Owns external communication related to product area - with customers and partners - in partnership with marketing or internal stakeholders.
May lead multiple teams of PMs. Actively recruits senior product talent into the organization in addition to growing from within.
Leads internal initiatives that may span multiple tracks and disciplines.
Supports and own pieces of strategic relationships with external partners.
Able to successfully align and influence senior cross-functional stakeholders across the B&T.
Scope of impact - either in the shape of metric impact or strategic intiative development - should define success for the B&T.
Meaningfully impacts the B&T strategy.

7.competency_description: Defines and communicates near-term frameworks and long-term strategy that provides direction to B&T product and crossfunctional areas.
Idenfities and executes on new strategic investments that affect broader decisionmaking across areas of oversight.
Co-owner of the B&T OpEd alongside Captain and ottheir stakeholders.
Responsible for coordinated execution across multiple B&Ts.
Drives intra-B&T initiatives and/or high-impact initiatives across multiple teams building alignment amongst senior leaders across the company
Proactively builds and refines routines that enable and expedited delivery.
Owns staffing and structure decisions for owned areas
Develops strong relationships across disciplines and senior stakeholders.
Heat sink for challenging topics, contention, and escalations as they arise across the B&T
Defines, embodies, and carries the Carvana culture for their area. Identifies and addresses culture and morale issues across the team.
Shares best practices and helps spearhead new programs or initiatives to build the capacity of the PM organization and the company
Creates energy and inspires teams to do great work and stay committed to our mission.
Able to drive strategic communication for supported B&Ts to all parties, including the executive team.
Rosetta stone for supported B&Ts - facilitating strong levels of communication and shared awareness within and across the B&Ts.
Owns external communication related to product area - with customers and partners - in partnership with marketing or internal stakeholders.
May lead multiple teams of PMs. Actively recruits senior talent across all disciplines into the organization in addition to growing from within.
Leads internal initiatives that may span multiple B&Ts.
Owns pieces of strategic relationships with external partners.
Able to successfully align and influence senior cross-functional stakeholders across the Cluster.
Scope of impact - either in the shape of metric impact or strategic intiative development - should define success for the Cluster.
Meaningfully impacts the Cluster strategy.

8.competency_description: Defines and communicates near-term frameworks and long-term strategy that provides direction to B&T product and crossfunctional areas.
Idenfities and executes on new strategic investments that affect broader decisionmaking across areas of oversight.
Co-owner of the B&T OpEd alongside Captain and ottheir stakeholders.
Responsible for coordinated execution across Cluster.
Drives Cluster-level initiatives and/or high-impact initiatives across multiple teams building alignment amongst senior leaders across the company
Proactively builds and refines routines that enable and expedited delivery.
Develops strong relationships across disciplines, senior stakeholders, and the executive team.
Escalation point for challenging topics, contention, and escalations as they arise across the Cluster
Defines, embodies, and carries the Carvana culture for their area. Identifies and addresses culture and morale issues across the team.
Shares best practices and helps spearhead new programs or initiatives to build the capacity of the PM organization and the company
Creates energy and inspires teams to do great work and stay committed to our mission.
Able to drive strategic communication for the Cluster to all parties, including the executive team.
Rosetta stone for the Cluster - facilitating strong levels of communication and shared awareness within the Cluster.
Drives external communication related to product area - with customers and partners - in partnership with marketing or internal stakeholders.
May lead multiple teams of PMs. Actively recruits senior talent across all disciplines into the organization in addition to growing from within.
Leads internal initiatives that span multiple clusters and disciplines.
Builds and owns strategic relationships with external partners.
Successfully aligns and influence senior cross-functional stakeholders across clusters and the executive team.
Directly impacting Cluster KPIs and, indirectly, Company level KPIs.
Impacts long-term strategy for the company in concert with executive team.

9.competency_description: Defines and contributes to company-wide strategy by building frameworks that drive decisionmaking for large portions of the company.
Assists in setting corporate level strategy with executive team.
Guides strong execution across large portions of the company.
Owns company-wide strategic initiatives working as an extension of the executive team.
Driving organizational structure and staffing changes to support successful execution.
Builds and maintains positive relationships across the company at all levels.
Ultimate escalation point for nearly all issues, contention, challenges that arise within their organization. Able to handle them successfully and efficiently.
Exemplar of Carvana culture across the company.

Continuously investing in new or contributing to existing intiatives to build the capacity of the PM organization and company generally. Materially making the company better, in its output and how it gets there.
Creates energy and inspires teams to do great work and stay committed to our mission.
Primary POC internally and externally for large areas of the business.
Able to communicate the most complex topics across every level of the organization successfully.
May manage multiple large teams of PMs. Actively recruiting senior talent and leadership across all disciplines.
Driving and owning key strategic external relationships.
Able to influence and align executive team around challenging and complex topics.
Significantly impacting topline company KPIs (GPU, Margin, etc.)
Drives long-term strategy for the company in concert with executive team.

10.competency_description: As a part of the executive team, sets and defines company-wide near, mid, and long term vision and strategy.
Builds frameworks leveraged by the Product and Engineering teams to ensure a cohesive, customer-centric, and profitable product and technology approach for the company.
Ultimately responsible for sustained, high performance across the entirety of the product and technology organization.
Inspires strong execution both by example, through direct advisement, and via the development of people and teams reponsible for its enablement.
Maintains a sufficiently senior and autonomous leadership team to unlock the ability to dive deep into specific projects on an as-needed basis to drive successful execution.
Acts as a mentor to the organization's most senior leaders for navigating the enterprise in all directions.
Seeks and recruits talent into the organization both within Product, as well as other functional orgs.
Serves as a role model to the entire company for Carvana values and culture.
Creates energy and inspires teams to do their best work, aligning their passions with the most acute needs of the business.
Bridges communication of company strategy to all Product and Engineering teams.
Inspires the organization with compelling vision and rational optimism.
An active participant and decision maker in all corporate level strategic decisions.
Lead and mentor world-class leaders creating and enforcing high standards for execution, culture, and alignment.
Acts as a decision making authority and company representative for external relationships including, but not limited to, vendors, partners, and investors.
Significantly impacting topline company KPIs (GPU, Margin, etc.), as well as consistently raising the talent bar for the organization.
Drives long-term strategy for the company as an executive leader.
